solution:
```python
import re

def replace_question_marks(s):
    s = re.sub(r'\?', '0', s)
    return s

def is_valid(s):
    if not re.match(r'^[LR\(\),0-9]+$', s):
        return False
    if re.search(r'\([0-9]+[0-9]*\)', s):
        return False
    if re.search(r'[0-9]+[0-9]*\)', s):
        return False
    if re.search(r'\([0-9]+[0-9]*\)[0-9]+', s):
        return False
    if re.search(r'[0-9]+[0-9]*\)[0-9]+', s):
        return False
    return True

def calculate_score(s):
    s = replace_question_marks(s)
    if not is_valid(s):
        return 'invalid'
    s = s.replace('L(', '(')
    s = s.replace('R(', '(')
    s = s.replace('R)', ')')
    s = s.replace('L)', ')')
    s = s.replace('L', '')
    s = s.replace('R', '')
    s = s.replace('(', '')
    s = s.replace(')', '')
    s = s.replace(',', '')
    return s

def main():
    s = input()
    print(calculate_score(s))

if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()
```
